resources.string: Coords needs access to your precise location and can\'t work otherwise. Please grant the permission.
Coords needs access to your fine location. Please grant the permission here:
This app requires access to your precise location. Approximate location access is not sufficient for this app, since it is not precise enough. Please upgrade the granted permission below:
You have only granted access to your approximate location, but this app requires access to your precise location. Please upgrade to fine location access below:
\"Plus codes\" are an open specification by Google, also known as the \"Open Location Code\".
What3Words is a grid-based algorithm to assign three-word codes to grid tiles. This uses an external service that only receives the current position.
